nodes.text: UR-3741 was a location in the Moddell sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Before the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, UR-3741 was part of a map by Corporal Ractivelle of the Stardust unit as part of the Rebel Alliance's preparation for their attack on the second Death Star.

Before the Battle of Endor, the map of the Moddell sector and the accompanying reports were archived in The Rebel Files, a central data archive that contained secret rebel documents and reports. In 34 ABY, The Rebel Files were rediscovered and ultimately given to the Resistance.
UR-3741 was first mentioned in Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 18, a canon magazine first released in 2015 and published by De Agostini.
